Name: Unus (Age of Apocalypse)
Description: Unus worked for Apocalypse and was sent into Old New York City to search for any remaining humans there and to kill them.
FirstComicDescription: This chromium wrap-around cover set the stage for the Age of Apocalypse in the Marvel U. Only Joe Madureira and Tim Townsend could make a depressingly dystopian future look this good!
